definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: Where should the mean be now?
sentences.chinese: 現在的平均值會是多少？

sentences.english: Using both together, you can calculate an average.
sentences.chinese: 兩者結合起來可以計算平均值。

sentences.english: It says that on average, you should be around 20.
sentences.chinese: 它表示的是平均值，應該在20左右。

sentences.english: China moves more than 10 times as much freight per kilometer of its train routes than the global average.
sentences.chinese: 中國鐵路每公里貨運量是世界平均值的十倍。

sentences.english: To answer that, you first need to calculate the norm of your quaternion .
sentences.chinese: 答案在這，你首先需要計算你的四元數的平均值。

sentences.english: The daily mean value showed that the water utility of the plant is more efficient after rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 一日內水分利用效率平均值雨前高於雨後。

sentences.english: The WMO's final figure is an average of the three sets of data.
sentences.chinese: 世界氣象組織的最終數據是這三組數據的平均值。

sentences.english: After five batches cultivation, the predicted values were verified by validation experiments.
sentences.chinese: 經五批培養驗證，預測值與驗證試驗平均值接近。

sentences.english: It is shown that the calculated values are resonably consistent with the mean values taken from practical record of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 結果指出，計算值與來自實船記錄的平均值是吻合的。

sentences.english: This is about the industry average.
sentences.chinese: 這大約是行業的平均值。

sentences.english: And then computes the mean of, getting me the mean of all the stocks in it.
sentences.chinese: 然後再計算平均值，所有股票的平均值。

sentences.english: And then computes the mean of, getting me the mean of all the stocks in it.
sentences.chinese: 然後再計算平均值，所有股票的平均值。

sentences.english: The weight-average method was applied to make the original image to the grayscale image.
sentences.chinese: 在圖像灰度化的階段是採用了加權平均值的方法。

sentences.english: The following figure shows the calculation for the arithmetic mean for each of the four valuation metrics.
sentences.chinese: 下面的數據顯示了四個估值的算術平均值。

sentences.english: Where am I computing the mean?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪兒計算了這個平均值？

sentences.english: Consider a single-argument expression that applies averaging on its input expression. Listing 5 shows the CriteriaQuery to select the average balance of all Accounts
sentences.chinese: 考慮一個對輸入表達式應用平均值的單參數表達式。

definition: to be on the high side/to be unusually high
